column4: hi there. I was wondering whether you can help me understand the following: when installing a new system, almost no package is marked as automatically installed in aptitude. So when I start removing single applications, won't that leave me with a lot of cruft?
look at the --purge option of aptitude
but how will aptitude know what to purge if all packages are marked as manually installed?
you need to look at the debian/control file this is how all package managers read dependecys and what not
